TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PrepareHandler(object o, PrepareArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed PrepareHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the PrepareHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the PrepareHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the PrepareHandler is removed from the event.
